name: Endless Dash
description:
This is Endless Dash, a really bad copy of Geometry Dash, but theorically it is endless.

It was created just for fun, in fact it is really bad and very repetitive sometimes, the physic is just not good, and is very different from the original one, this copy has no reason to exists, so, if you get bored, go play the original Geometry Dash.

How to play:

  1. Click with left mouse to jump.
  2. When you notice this game sucks, click on "Close" (usually after 10-20 seconds).
